image.title: Osho - The complete works of Osho

item.title: 1 Jokes of Mulla Nasruddin
item.description: < Previous | Contents ‌CHAPTER 1 Jokes of Mulla Nasruddin Dedication written on July 21, 1971 1. A rich farmer had been trying desperately to marry off his daughters. One day he met Mulla Nasrudin. “I have several daughters,” the farmer told the Mulla. “I would like to see them comfortably fixed. And I will say this, they won’t go to their husbands without a little bit in the bank, either.
